## Budget Breakdown (approx. per person)

- **Flights:** ~â‚¹55,000-65,000 (economy Delhi<->Paris, round-trip via cheapoair.com)
- **Accommodation:** â‚¹20,000-30,000 (4 nights mid-range hotel, shared double)
- **Food:** â‚¹10,000-15,000 (mix of bistros, cafÃ©s, 1-2 special dinners)
- **Activities & Tickets:** â‚¹8,000-12,000 (all sites, museums, shows)
- **Local Transport:** â‚¹3,000-4,000 (Metro, trains, occasional taxi)
- **Shopping/Misc:** Optional, budget extra if needed

## Essential Paris Tips
- Paris Metro is safe, fast, and easyâ€”buy day/multi-day passes.
- Most museums closed on Mondays or Tuesdaysâ€”plan accordingly.
- Light layers, comfortable shoes, carry an umbrella (Paris weather is changeable).
- Card payments widely accepted, but carry some euros for small purchases.

## Pre-Trip Checklist
- Valid Schengen visa for France
- International travel insurance
- Euros for local expenses (withdraw at airport ATMs or major banks)
- Universal adaptor for power sockets
- Book tickets for Eiffel Tower, Louvre, Moulin Rouge in advance
